alert.note: Alert for Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 1:47AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Natchitoches and central Sabine Parishes, southeastern Shelby, northeastern San Augustine and northern Sabine Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 147 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bland Lake to Patroon to near Zwolle. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milam, Many, San Augustine, Zwolle, Rosevine, Patroon, Bland Lake, Florien, Noble, Fisher, Hurstown, Sexton, Calgary, Mount Carmel, Bellwood, Negreet, Toledo Bend Reservoir North and Jordans Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
